settings.start_heading: Want to Find Out your Jewellery colour?
settings.start_content: Answer 5 Lifestyle quick questions and we will let you know which colour you suit more (SILVER/GOLD) .
settings.question1_image: Question 1: Speed boat or Classic Car?
settings.bottom_text1: determining your lifestyle trends gives us a great idea on how to tailor your preferred jewellery colour. Please note this quiz is to give you an idea of what we think will suit you best.
settings.question2_image: Question 2: What style house do you like more?
settings.bottom_text2: An idea on what style you like more also gives us a great idea on how to tailor your preferred jewellery colour. Please note this quiz is to give you an idea of what we think will suit you best.
settings.bottom_text3: This helps us determine what lifestyle trends you like.
settings.question4_image: Question 4: Evening Drinks Or Evening Chills?
settings.bottom_text4: An idea on what style you like more also gives us a great idea on how to tailor your preferred jewellery colour. Please note this quiz is to give you an idea of what we think will suit you best.
settings.bottom_text5: An idea on your lifestyle gives us a great idea on how to tailor your preferred jewellery colour. Please note this quiz is to give you an idea of what we think will suit you best.
settings.form_text: We just calculating your go to colour. To get your results fill the form in and we will send it over to you in around 5 minutes. We will also attach a mystery discount code inside the email.
